title: Issa Rae is a ray of sunshine in plunging yellow number at ELLE's 26th Annual Women In Hollywood
text:
Issa Rae looked ravishing in yellow while walking the red carpet at ELLE's 26th Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration, before changing into a red outfit on stage.

The 34 year old Insecure creator and starred rocked a canary yellow look, similar to her dress at HBO's TCA summer tour panel in July, though it's not the same dress.

Rae hosted the event, held at the Four Seasons Hotel on Monday, though she changed outfits while on stage.

Yellow on the red carpet: Issa Rae looked ravishing in yellow while walking the red carpet at ELLE's 26th Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration

Rae wore a striking canary yellow dress with a plunging neckline, an open back and a slit up the leg.

The actress/writer/producer had her hair pulled back with a pair of silver dangling earrings and several silver and diamond rings.

She completed her look with a pair of stiletto heels before taking the stage as the event's host with a completely different look.

Taking the plunge: No doubt all eyes were on the 34-year-old actress

Issa's dress: Rae wore a striking canary yellow dress with a plunging neckline, an open back and a slit up the leg

When she took the stage, she switch to a tie-less tuxedo with a white dress shirt with studs and a red velvet coat with black lapels.

She was spotted backstage with The Chi creator Lena Waithe, who was wearing a tie-less red suit as well.

Waithe was one of the 10 women honored by Elle at the event, including Scarlett Johansson, Mindy Kaling, Nicole Kidman, Melina Matsoukas, Gwyneth Paltrow, Dolly Parton, Natalie Portman, Jodie Turner-Smith and Zendaya.

Ladies in red: She was spotted backstage with The Chi creator Lena Waithe, who was wearing a tie-less red suit as well

Issa and Lena: When she took the stage, she switch to a tie-less tuxedo with a white dress shirt with studs and a red velvet coat with black lapels

All smiles: The actress/writer/producer had her hair pulled back with a pair of silver dangling earrings and several silver and diamond rings

Rae's on-stage presence did not go unnoticed by several in the crowd, including The Good Place star Jameela Jamil.

The actress shared a brief video on her Instagram story, where she said she's, 'obsessed with @issarae.'

Rae got her start writing on shows like The Choir and taking on acting guest spots on numerous TV spots before she starred in and created HBO's Insecure.

Obsessed: Rae's on-stage presence did not go unnoticed by several in the crowd, including The Good Place star Jameela Jamil

Big fan: The actress shared a brief video on her Instagram story, where she said she's, 'obsessed with @issarae'

She also starred in the big-screen comedy Little alongside Black-Ish star Marsai Martin, and she voices the mom in the short film Hair Love that played in front of The Angry Birds Movie 2.

Rae also stars in The Photograph with Chelsea Perreti, Lakeith Stanfield and Courtney B. Vance, in theaters on Valentine's Day.

She also stars in The Lovebirds with Kumain Nanjiani and Anna Camp, arriving April 3, 2020 and she has Empress of Serenity with Bill Hader and American Princess both in pre-production.

Big screen: She also starred in the big-screen comedy Little alongside Black-Ish star Marsai Martin, and she voices the mom in the short film Hair Love that played in front of The Angry Birds Movie 2
description: Issa Rae looked ravishing in yellow while walking the red carpet at  ELLE's 26th Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration, before changing into a red outfit on stage.
